songs.title: Against The Grain (Outro)
songs.lyrics:
[Verse : DJ Kush]
That's right come again,that's right, from the rules
Because I'ma still wear my rag, cuz[?]
Yeah, you all, last try
We're about to wrap it up and cap it up, you know what I'm saying?
Ay yo, thanks for tuning in to WFUKYOU!
This is DJ Kush, don't push!
You know what I'm saying?

[Outro]
Keep it hood nigga'!
